text: The Vashi Data Center in Vashi, Mumbai, is our oldest data center, with 25 years of continuous operation, since it was commissioned in September 2000 by our Promoter, STL. The Vashi Data Center had a built IT power capacity of 0.38 MW, as of June 30, 2025. Through the Vashi Data Center, we offer colocation services, disaster recovery as a service ("DRaaS") and ancillary data center services. It is a carrier-neutral facility that contains dual meet-me-rooms and multiple telecom services providers, and internet exchanges that deliver a redundant and robust telecom network to clients. As of June 30, 2025, the Vashi Data Center is a fully-sold data center, which means it is operating at peak capacity. Clients whose services are hosted at the Vashi Data Center include colocation clients from multiple industries, including BFSIs, internet service providers ("ISPs"), over-the-top players ("OTT") and government sector clients.
